prompt:
Crea service con metodi:
- Page<Event> search(String q, OffsetDateTime from, OffsetDateTime to, String city, String category, Pageable pageable)
- Event get(UUID id) (throw NotFoundException)
- Event create(EventCreateRequest req)
- Event update(UUID id, EventCreateRequest req)
- void delete(UUID id)
Implementa search con Specification JPA:
- se q presente: title ILIKE %q% OR description ILIKE %q%
- se from/to: startAt >= from, startAt <= to
- se city/category: equals ignore case
Usa repository.
Solo codice.
